cmd='bash;-c;cd <SOURCE_DIR> && if [ ! -f ./configure ] $<SEMICOLON> then autoconf $<SEMICOLON> fi &&                                  cd <BINARY_DIR> && output=$(CC=" /usr/bin/cc" CXX=" /usr/bin/c++" <SOURCE_DIR>/configure --prefix=<BINARY_DIR> 2>&1) ||                                  (printf "$output\n" && false)'
